Text.Page:
Here in Raga Shadi, the argons were vivisecting creatures for some reason. You know what vivisecting is, right? It's like an autopsy, except the subject isn't dead yet.

As grisly as that is, we want to know what the argons learned. And the way to do that is to get to the flask-like containers where they've stored something. Something important.

Weirdly mutilated corpses, eh? Well, it's a clue. I have some experiments of my own to perform—nothing gory, I promise—to figure out what the argons were up to.

While I'm doing that, go to the Shineroot Chamber and help Platanok.
It's not gonna be pleasant, whatever's in those containers, <PCNAME>. But we have to know.

I trust Alecian fares well?

My research is, I confess, at a standstill. There are some obstacles to overcome, but perhaps your presence will change that.

Every journey starts somewhere. Let us begin.
